name: brcnv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)

comment: The converse of a binary relation swaps arguments. Theorem 11 of [Suppes] p. 61. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1995.)
